name: Troike

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: I'm getting the heck out of here. You go place that thermite and do what you need to do.

topics.topic_text: I found proof of your blackmail.
topics.response_text: Well that motherfucker. What the hell. Damn, thanks for finding this.

topics.topic_text: What do you do here?
topics.response_text: I don't see how that's your business. I'm just a guest here, having a little fun.

topics.topic_text: So what's your story?
topics.response_text: Hey man, I don't know nothing. Let me have some peace here, buddy.

topics.topic_text: Do you know where the knife came from?
topics.response_text: I keep a little switchblade tucked away with me. You never know when you might find some trouble.

topics.topic_text: Cachino sent me to ask you about some guns.
topics.response_text: Cachino... Cachino what? Are you kidding me? He must be trying to get me killed.

topics.topic: vDialogueGomorrahVMS21TroikeTopic004Tell me what happened with the prostitute.
topics.topic_text: Tell me what happened with the prostitute.
topics.response_text: Oh man, I don't even like to think about it. All that goddamn blood. It was just in the hotel like any other night.

topics.topic_text: What kind of chems were you doing?
topics.response_text: That night? Mostly buffout, I like to cut it with a little bit of jet, and wash it down with some whiskey. That was my standard Saturday night...

topics.topic_text: How did the family find out about it?
topics.response_text: When I saw the body I started screaming, a few seconds some of their soldiers were in there cleaning up the room.

topics.topic_text: That seems like a lot of chems.
topics.response_text: Like I said, pretty standard for me. I can handle my shit.

topics.topic_text: That doesn't sound like enough to get you to lose the whole night.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] What? Yeah, you're right. I wonder what was up with that.

topics.topic_text: I have a couple more questions about what happened that night.
topics.response_text: Alright, have at it.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: What do you wanna talk about?

topics.topic_text: That's it for now.
topics.response_text: See ya.

topics.topic_text: Would you like me to try to get you out of your contract?
topics.response_text: You'd do that? For me? I'm not sure what can be done, but you'd be doing me a solid if you would. I've been talking to Big Sal mostly.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking to help Cachino break up whatever the Bosses are planning.
topics.response_text: Yeah? Well fuck that. The bosses have my number, and I'm a company man while they've got the goods on me.

topics.topic_text: Maybe I can help you out of your contract with the family.
topics.response_text: More power to you if you can, but keep me out of it. I've been doing business with Big Sal, so he's going to be your man.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> If you don't help me, I'll report your work here to NCR.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Great. So I'm fucked either way. I guess I don't have any choice but to help you. Just try not to get me killed here.

topics.topic_text: Cachino forgot to tell me what they have on you.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I guess if Cachino trusts you I can tell you a little of what happened. It all started with a prostitute in here.

topics.topic_text: I have a couple more questions about the guns.
topics.response_text: Okay, try and be fast about it.

topics.topic_text: How do you get the guns into the strip?
topics.response_text: I'm pretty proud of myself. It's a stroke of genius, if I can be so modest.

topics.topic_text: Give me the Thermite and I'll destroy the weapons.
topics.response_text: Okay, here's the Thermite and a key to the room where the guns are stored. Place the Thermite on the crates in the room.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Alright, let's.

topics.topic_text: That's it for now.
topics.response_text: Okay, cool.

topics.topic_text: Where do the guns come from?
topics.response_text: I've made lots of contacts over the years. I have some friends back in California that can get their hands on just about anything.

topics.topic: vDialogueGomorrahVMS21TroikeTopic023{Speech Option, threaten to sell troike out if he doesn't turn in the thermite}
topics.topic_text: If you don't deploy the Thermite yourself, I'll tell the bosses what you've been planning.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Hey, fuck you.

topics.topic_text: What is Thermite?
topics.response_text: Thermite is a mix of rust and aluminum dust. If you add a little heat, a massive{emphasized}amount of heat is spit out.

topics.topic_text: Big Sal agreed to let you go.
topics.response_text: Holy shit, really? Okay, I'll help you, but I'm getting the hell out of here first chance I get.

topics.topic_text: Your bosses sent me to you to see if you needed any help with your work for them.
topics.response_text: Yeah, I heard you might be coming. I appreciate the help, I'm in kind of a fix.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the problem with the last shipment.
topics.response_text: The Fiends, a group of raiders freaked out on chems, stole my last shipment before I could get it into Vegas.

topics.topic_text: How are you getting the weapons into the strip?
topics.response_text: I'm pretty proud of myself. It's a stroke of genius, if I can be so modest.

topics.topic_text: Why do you work for the Omertas?
topics.response_text: Sorry, that's my business and no one else's.

topics.topic_text: Do you mean these weapon parts?
topics.response_text: What the hell? You got this from the Fiends already? Hot damn, you really are good. Thanks, this is exactly what I needed.

topics.topic_text: I'll keep an eye out for them.
topics.response_text: Great, thanks.

topics.topic_text: I have a couple more questions.
topics.response_text: Okay, what do you need to know?

topics.topic_text: I want to ask about something else.
topics.response_text: Okay, what's on your mind?

topics.topic_text: That's all I have for questions right now.
topics.response_text: Alright, you know where to find me.

topics.topic_text: I found those weapon parts you needed.
topics.response_text: Well, hot shit. Thank you. Must have been a real bitch getting it from the Fiends, thanks.

topics.topic_text: What can we do to take care of the guns?
topics.response_text: As a little pet project I've been making some thermite. Thermite burns as hot as the devil's asshole and can melt through just about anything.

description:
Troike is a 35 year-old African American Male.

A human smuggler of African American descent, Troike operates out of the Gomorrah casino on the New Vegas Strip. He works for the Omertas family, using his network of contacts to smuggle weapons into the casino, bypassing the Strip's security measures.

Troike's Personality: Troike is cautious and paranoid, with a strong sense of self-preservation. He's addicted to jet and often struggles with chem-induced blackouts that leave him with fragmented memories of his actions. Despite his affiliation with the Omertas, he's not fully committed to their cause and can be persuaded to act against them if approached correctly.

Troike's Backstory: Troike grew up in the Mojave Wasteland, learning to survive through cunning and resourcefulness. He eventually fell in with the Omertas, who recognized his talent for bypassing security systems and acquiring contraband. His addiction to jet began as a way to cope with the stress of his dangerous lifestyle, but it has become a liability. He has a recurring nightmare about a blackout incident where he woke up next to a deceased sex worker, covered in bloodâ€”a memory he can't fully recall but haunts him nonetheless.
